home.name: I'M <1>OLENA</1>
home.role: Junior SAP ABAP Developer · Full Stack Web Developer
home.description: I’m a passionate developer who loves creating clean, meaningful and well-structured solutions—whether in modern web technologies (JavaScript, Next.js, PHP, Laravel, Symfony) or in the growing world of SAP ABAP.<0></0>What drives me is understanding how things work, improving them, and turning complexity into something elegant and functional.<0></0>Based in Spain and excited to grow, learn and contribute as a Junior SAP ABAP Developer or Full Stack Developer, both remote and on-site.

about.heroTitle: I'm <1>Olena Holub</1>, Junior SAP ABAP Developer & Full-Stack Web Developer
about.heroDescription: I’m a passionate developer with a solid foundation in <1>full-stack web development</1> (JavaScript, TypeScript, Next.js, React, PHP, Laravel, Symfony) and a growing specialization in <1>SAP ABAP</1> and enterprise-grade software development.<0></0><0></0>I love building clean, scalable, and well-structured applications — whether in modern web environments or in the SAP ecosystem. My background in OOP, data structures, business logic, and clean architecture translates naturally into ABAP development: modularization, validations, data modeling, performance-oriented code and long-term maintainability.<0></0><0></0>Currently based in Spain and open to both <1>remote and on-site opportunities</1>.<0></0><0></0>I have hands-on experience deploying apps with <1>Vercel, Railway, and AWS</1>, and solid knowledge of <1>Java and Python</1>. I’m deeply committed to continuous learning and evolving into a strong SAP ABAP professional while keeping my full-stack versatility.

service1.title: Full-Stack Web Development
service1.desc: Building modern, responsive applications using React, Next.js, Node.js, PHP, Laravel & Symfony.

service2.title: API Design & Integration
service2.desc: Creating and consuming RESTful APIs, ensuring secure, scalable data flow across frontend and backend.

service3.title: Deployment & Continuous Learning
service3.desc: Fast and reliable deployment using Vercel and Railway. Always expanding my knowledge with new tools and tech.

portfolio.description: Explore my recent projects showcasing modern web development with clean code and great user experience.

featured.title: FreediveAnalyzer
featured.subtitle: Personal Project – Full Stack App (2024)
featured.description: FreediveAnalyzer is a full-stack web platform for logging and analyzing freediving sessions, designed with scalability and modularity in mind. Built with a React SPA frontend and a Laravel RESTful API backend, it supports multilingual interfaces (i18next), secure JWT-based authentication (email/password and Google OAuth), and real-time data visualization via Recharts. The system enables manual and bulk dive imports (.xml/.sml), tracks dive metrics, and delivers performance insights through dynamic charts and oxygen recovery ratios. Deployed with CI/CD pipelines (GitHub + Docker + Vercel), integrated with PostgreSQL, and optimized for cross-device responsiveness.

penyes.title: PenyesAPP
penyes.subtitle: Academic Project – Full Stack Platform (2025)
penyes.description: Web platform designed for managing local festival groups ('peñas'), enabling administrators to oversee users, peñas, payments, and fair draw systems, while users can join groups, manage their profile, and track payments. Includes role-based access, a dynamic cadafal draw implemented in React, and an integrated wallet for fee management.

recommendation.paragraph1: "During her training at our center, Olena has proven to be an exemplary student, with a proactive attitude, great learning ability, and a strong commitment to her professional development.
recommendation.paragraph2: She stands out for her curiosity, her ability to solve problems independently, and her genuine interest in programming and software development. Not only has she achieved excellent academic results —including graduating with honors— but she has also demonstrated exceptional skills in teamwork and taking on responsibilities.
recommendation.paragraph3: I am confident that Olena will bring great value to any project or team she joins."
